item.title: The Discourse has been Automated
item.description: An AI agent submitted a PR to matplotlib, got rejected, and then wrote a callout blogpost attacking the maintainer. I have no idea how to feel about this.

item.title: Matrix ain't it chief
item.description: Watch arathorn get in the replies for this one.

item.title: Humanity's last programming language
item.description: What if markdown was executable? You get markdownlang.

item.title: Zendesk, get your shit together please
item.description: BORN TO GET SPAMMED, WORLD IS A FUCK, SPAMHAUS THEM ALL 2026, I am inbox full man, 410,757,864,530 Zendesk emails

item.title: Life pro tip: a Steam Deck can be a bluetooth speaker
item.description: Your headphones may only let you get audio from one source at once, but Linux has no such limitations!

item.title: Did Zendesk get popped?
item.description: I've got like 50 emails from Zendesk customers to activate an account.

item.title: Backfilling Discord forum channels with the power of terrible code
Tormentmaxxing 'simple requests'
item.description: Automating the full lifecycle of 'quick' requests with Claude Code slash commands

item.title: I made a simple agent for PR reviews. Don't use it.
item.description: Reviewbot is eternal, yet also very cooked.
